#include<stdio.h>
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
    return(b==0?a:gcd(b,a%b));
}
int main()
{
	long long int n,m,a,b,c,even1,odd1,even2,odd2;int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
		if(n%2==0)
		{
			even1=n/2;
			odd1=n/2;
		}
		else
		{
			even1=n/2;odd1=(n/2)+1;
		}
		if(m%2==0)
		{
			even2=m/2;
			odd2=m/2;
		}
		else
		{
			even2=m/2;odd2=(m/2)+1;
		}
		a=(even1*odd2)+(even2*odd1);
		b=n*m;c=gcd(a,b);
		a=a/c;b=b/c;
		printf("%lld/%lld\n",a,b);
	}return 0;
}
